alert.note: Alert for Southampton; Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:27PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Hertford, northwestern Gates, and southeastern Southampton Counties, the City of Franklin and the southwestern City of Suffolk through 600 PM EDT... At 527 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Franklin, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Roduco around 550 PM EDT. Gates around 555 PM EDT. Whaleyville around 600 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Easons Crossroads, Topsy, Drum Hill, Hazelton, Buckland, Cleopus, Dort, Somerton, Riddicksville and Bartonsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
